Third Party Content
The Content includes items that have been sourced from third parties as set out below. D2RQ
The plug-in is accompanied by D2RQ software developed by Prof. Dr. Chris Bizer of Web-based Systems Group, Freie Universität, Berlin (the “Owner”).
Use of D2RQ has been granted to TopQuadrant by the owner under a special license agreement. Your use of the software is subject to these terms and conditions. A copy of the license can be found in /org.topbraid.lib.d2rq/about_files/d2rq.LICENSE.txt and is also available at http://www.topquadrant.com/docs/legal/D2RQ_V0.7_TQlicense.pdf.
The modified source for the D2RQ is included in the folder(s) listed below:
* /org.topbraid.lib.d2rq/src-d2rq
